valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 7 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 8 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Forties 993 expected Fisher 999 by 0600 tomorrow. Atlantic low moving rapidly east expected just west of Sole 997 by same time. New low expected Bailey 991 by that time
